attributes.action: Remembering The Great War100 years on.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the start of the Great War next year, to be treated as a remembrance not as Mr Cameron calls a celebration to resemble the Diamond Jubilee.This was a tragic time in our history which robbed millions of families their loved ones.Lets remember it with dignity,& educate the young into the sacrifices made for them.So as they realise at what cost our freedoms were brought with.
